body.name: Dash Cam WiFi 2.5K 1440P Front Dash Camera for Cars, E-YEEGER Car Camera Mini Dashcams with App, Night Vision, 24H Parking Mode, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, Free 32G Card, Support 256GB Max, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
features: 🚘【2.5K*1440P Dash Cam】The dash cam for cars equipped with advanced starvis sensor and 6 glass lens, capturing every detail of your drive in ultra-clear 2560*1440P resolution, providing 70% higher pixels than 1080P. Front 160° wide angle reduces blind spots and covers four lanes easily. Super night vision technology with F1.8 large aperture increase light intake by 30%, ensure clear and sharp footage even in low light conditions.

🚘【Smooth 2.4G WiFi-APP Control】Car camera comes with APP for iOS & Android smartphones to get real-time live stream, convenient to preview, download videos, change setting, share footage with family or friends through social platforms. Perfect dashcam for cars, truck, SUV, easier to provide evidence when insurance claim.

🚘【Safe& Mini Design】With heat-resistance chipset and aluminum alloy shell, the car dash cam has longer lifespan and stable performance. Survive extreme weather conditions from -40°F to 185°F. The mini and hidden design won’t block your view while driving. No built-in lithium battery, away from risks of high temperature or vehicle collisions. Maximize safety for you and your car.

🚘【Seamless Loop Recording & G-sensor】Loop recording overwrites the oldest unlocked file when card is full. Triggered by G-Sensor, the dash cam front will automatically detects sudden vibration or shock and locks the video without being overwritten. Adopt real-time storage TS stream technology and RC circuit for faster storage, avoid damage and loss of video.

🚘【24H Parking&Time Lapse】Hardwire Kit (ASIN: B0BZV58J37, NOT Included) is needed for this function. This wifi dash cam will auto switch to parking mode while your car is parked, ensures your car under surveillance round the clock. 24H Time lapse mode keeps recording continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate, protecting vehicle from theft or vandalism.

🚘【Free 32G SD Card&256G Max Support】Free 32G SD card is pre-installed in the camera for car. Support Max 256G memory, we recommend using U1 or Above SD card. Adopt H.265 encoding technology, saves 50% memory without compromising video quality. The car dash camera is backed by 1-year warranty and 45 days full refund. Please contact us if you have any needs, we're always here for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, easy setup
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a dashcam as I recently bought a new car and wanted some extra insurance in case something were to go wrong. I had done a lot of digging for a dashcam and ultimately decided on either a 1440p or 4K dash cam. This goes without saying, 1080p simply isn't a good enough picture quality if you really want to be able to capture the entirety of your surroundings clearly. I have to say, it really has blown me away especially for the money. The picture is crystal clear and it functions perfectly at night as well. Everything gets saved to the app and you can easily retrieve footage through the app. This dash cam You really can't beat it at this price point, and it even comes with a high-quality original 32GB SD card, all for under $40. In the end, this is an absolute steal of a dashcam and the app is easy to understand. It's small and as long as you place it under your rear view mirror, it won't distract you at all. A must have for anyone on the road, regardless of whether your car is new or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive quaity and price!
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the image quality is very good on day or night. The resolution is 1440P which is better than standard HD cameras and will allow you to crop to get a larger image to retrieve a plate number, etc. without loosing too much image quality.Secondly, the installation is a simple affair, setting up the dash cam is a hassle-free process, taking approximately 10 minutes to complete. The accompanying mobile app, allows users to easily view and download recorded videos, enhancing convenience and accessibility. This integration with a mobile app simplifies video management and ensures a user-friendly experience.Furthermore, I particularly appreciate the voice broadcast working status feature. It provides real-time audio updates on the dash cam's operational status. This keeps me informed and reassured that everything is working as it should.Overall, this WiFi Dash Cam exceeds my expectations. Its compact design, robust materials, and advanced features make it an excellent choice for anyone in need of a reliable and convenient dash cam. I highly recommend it to fellow drivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job really well with all the feature points
reviews.reviewText: If you're in the market for a high-quality dash cam, I highly recommend this E-YEEGER V100 dash cam. This camera is packed with features that make it an excellent choice for anyone who wants to capture clear, high-quality footage while driving.First of all, the camera records in QHD 1440P, which means you'll get incredibly sharp and detailed video footage. It also has built-in WiFi, which is a fantastic feature that allows you to connect the camera to your smartphone or tablet. This means you can easily download footage and share it with others, making it a great tool for insurance claims or legal purposes.Another great feature of this camera is the night vision capability. The camera uses starlight sensors to capture clear footage in low light conditions, so you can be sure you'll be able to see everything even in the dark.Overall, I am extremely impressed with this dash cam. It is a high-quality camera that is packed with features, and it is incredibly easy to use. If you're in the market for a dash cam, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use, and effective
reviews.reviewText: Overall I think this is a great budget-friendly option for those who are looking for a simple way to record from the dash or rear window. The unit is small, lightweight, and allows for an expandable micro SD card allowing you to record many hours worth of video without overwriting old footage. The unit is unobtrusive, mounts easily, and does what it claims to do. It will automatically record video on a loop and store those on the SD card until its full, or files are deleted, and will automatically begin overwriting old clips once full. The app is easy to connect and allows full control over the unit's settings. As long as you're OK with having the device plugged into a 12v outlet, then I recommend this device. 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most cost-effective wifi dash cam I have ever seen!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this dashcam for only a couple of days now, but i am blow away with how this $39 works and compares to $79+ dash cams.For starters, out of the box it seems well made, its a solid little unit, it doesnt feel like cheap plastic, and it looks quite sleek and stylish.The setup i recommend you do before you install the camera as it makes it easier to fiddle around with the buttons on the dash cam and setting it up on your phone. The WiFi-mobile app control feature is a game-changer. I can easily connect my smartphone to the dash cam and conveniently preview and review recorded videos whenever I want. It's incredibly handy to modify the working parameters of the dash cam right from my phone as well. This level of control adds a new level of convenience to my driving experience.The video quality itself is amazing, I still cannot believe how incredible this dash cam is for the cost. The image is crisp, clear, you can read license plates and make out faces from a good distance away.It even came with a free 32gb SD card! Seriously, all of this for $39??Its an amazing dashcam at a fraction of the price. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dash Cam Wi-Fi 2.5
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product simple to setup and install it took me 15 minutes to install it in my Acura RDX.The built in WiFi works great where ever you go.It’s a 10 in my book

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality/budget friendly Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: This is not my first Dash Cam but the very first one has the Wi-Fi thing and it is amazing, I like the fact that it does not have screen which it makes look so simple in good way (at least for me) and if you need to see what is going on simply just connect it to your smart phone or device (Android or IOS) using the app which it will give you all the control you need.It was really easy setup, you just plug it into the car charging socket you can also hard wire it into your car if you're comfortable doing so and that’s what I did.Video quality is very good. The ability to use Wi-Fi to download the videos is very convenient.Overall worth the price and I would defiantly recommend it.

I love the dash cam because it keeps us safe and i found this dash cam is the best at the very reasonable price.The video quality is too good and more than my expectations. It is very easy to install.I would highly recommend this dash cam to buy it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable Dash Cam with Impressive Features
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the E-YEEGER 2.5K Car Camera, and I must say I'm quite impressed with its performance and features. Here's my detailed review:**Video Quality (4/5):** The 2.5K resolution provides sharp and clear video footage. Daytime recording is excellent, capturing license plates and road details with ease. Night vision is also commendable, though it could be slightly better in extremely dark conditions.**Ease of Installation (5/5):** Setting up this dash cam was a breeze. The included 32GB SD card is a nice addition. The user-friendly app makes it easy to configure settings and view recordings.**Durability (4/5):** The build quality seems sturdy, and the camera feels well-made. It has held up well in various weather conditions, but long-term durability remains to be seen.**Features (4/5):** The E-YEEGER dash cam is packed with features. The G-sensor automatically locks and saves footage during an accident, ensuring crucial evidence is preserved. Loop recording is seamless, and the 24-hour parking mode is a great security feature. The support for up to 256GB SD cards is a huge plus.**App Integration (4.5/5):** The app allows you to easily access and manage your recordings, making it convenient to review footage on your smartphone.In summary, the E-YEEGER 2.5K Car Camera is a reliable choice for those seeking a feature-rich dash cam. While it excels in most areas, there's room for minor improvements in night vision quality. Overall, it's a great investment for your safety and peace of mind while driving.

Need a dashcam for my car. Got this one within a reasonable price range. In terms of installation, usage, and performance, it's more than satisfactory. For the installation, it's just as easy as a piece of cake, just need to insert the plug into the cigarette lighter port and the camera starts working right away.The wire is long enough to adjust and set up the dash cam on the windshield. Comes with a manual that shows details instructions to install it. More surprisingly, it comes with a 32GB memory card, so I didn't need to get it separately.In terms of video recording, it's clear and good enough to record video even in dark night conditions. Also, the camera position is adjustable by simply twisting the camera mount. Can connect the device to the mobile app easily and access the recorded video. Overall quality can satisfy the expectations.
I install to my new car, and it works well. So far so good, no any complain about it, feel safe, satisfied about it!

I have been using this Dash Cam for two weeks now, and it is well-designed and comes with all the necessary accessories, such as a panel tool, SD card, extra 3M adhesive, and a useful paper user guide. The mini and hidden design of the Dash Cam allows for an unobstructed view while driving. However, it is important to note that this Dash Cam does not have a built-in lithium battery. One of the main factors that influenced my decision to purchase this Dash Cam was its 1-year warranty and 30-day full refund.Installation:The installation process is straightforward. The dash cam comes with a long enough cable to run behind the roof liner, A-pillar, and under the glove box to the console. The USB cable has a USB-C end, which attaches to the camera, and the other end is a 12V Cigarette Lighter Plug. However, it would have been better if they had provided a separate USB-C to USB-A connector so that users could use their existing multiple-port USB cigarette lighter outlet.Operation:Navigating the camera itself is easy once you read the manual. You need to use an app called VeeCar to view recorded videos. The camera connects to your phone via Wi-Fi. The recording loop can be set between 1/2/3 minutes.Picture Quality:The picture quality is good but not exceptional. Although the video resolution is decent, I don't think it is 4K quality when viewed through my phone. However, considering the price of this camera, it is hard to beat.Overview:This is an affordable Dash Cam that comes with a 1-year warranty and a 30-day full refund, which is a great option. The video quality is good enough to provide evidence when you need it. Although it has some drawbacks, I would still recommend this Dash Cam.
